name: reportWebinarPolls
description:
Retrieve a report on past [webinar polls](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749865-Polling-for-Webinars).

**Scopes:** `report:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`
**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or a higher plan with Webinar add-on enabled.

webinarId.description:
The webinar ID or the webinar UUID.  If a webinar ID is provided in the request instead of a UUID, the response will be for the latest webinar instance.

If a UUID starts with "/" or contains "//" (example: "/ajXp112QmuoKj4854875==\"), you must **double encode** the UUID before making an API request.

$ul: **id**: Webinar ID in "**long**" format(represented as int64 data type in JSON), also known as the webinar number.

**uuid**: Webinar UUID. Each webinar instance will generate its own UUID(i.e., after a Webinar ends, a new UUID will be generated for the next instance of the Webinar). Please double encode your UUID when using it for API calls if the UUID begins with a '/' or contains '//' in it.
